data.actual_result: Slowmode bar disappears for a bit
data.expected_result: The bar should not disappear , should stay as normal.
data.short_description: Slowmode bar disappears for a little bit
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server send a message or you can do it by others (Personally I tested it with Im immune on slowmode) - Select share and copy the link of the message - Delete the message - Paste the link of the message into same channel - Click the link and observe the slowmode bar
